requirements.summary: Implement a single-page UI with one clearly labeled button that intentionally performs no action when clicked.
acceptanceCriteria: The page renders a visible button with English label text.
Clicking the button does not change any visible UI state and does not trigger any side effects (no route changes, no backend calls, no console output, no dialogs).
The button remains enabled and clickable.

file_operations.description: Create the single-page App view that renders one clearly-labeled English button centered on the page; use the shadcn-ui Button component to provide a consistent accessible button without adding any click side effects (omit onClick or use an empty handler with no side effects). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the app renders the new single-page App component only, with no added navigation/routing and no additional providers that could introduce side effects for the button interaction.

requirements.summary: Apply a playful minimal visual theme with consistent colors, typography, spacing, and button hover/focus styling across the page.
acceptanceCriteria: The UI uses a consistent color palette and typography choices (not the default unstyled look).
The button styling matches the overall theme and has clear hover/focus states.
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Add global theme styling (playful minimal palette via CSS variables, base typography, background, spacing defaults, and focus-visible treatment) to ensure a coherent look across the single page.
Align Tailwind theme tokens to the playful minimal direction (e.g., ensure color tokens and radius values support the intended look) so component styling remains consistent across the app.

Apply consistent layout/typography/spacing classes so the page matches the global theme and the shadcn-ui Button hover/focus states feel cohesive. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
